title: Two arrested for murder & jewelry theft
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Two suspects have been arrested in connection with the murder of a man and the theft of jewelry in the Sisilapura area in Malabe.
Another suspect was arrested for pawning the jewelry that was looted from the residence on the 16th of March 2022.
Police said that the arrested suspects are to be produced before the Kaduwela Magistrate’s Court on Monday (21).
